_sText:
Well just put this in your map and put actions in the Output of the logic_relays. 
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/cTxMaSLf2qQ?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Advanced Difficulties changer will be released in a few days.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/hncZw0soq8E" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

8 Levels possible. Or 16 or 32 or 64 if you multiple it a couple of times.

The Changer is allready pretty good optimized. Nuke button to test everything is included and should/must(!!!) be removed if you copy the prefab in your map.
